Peach healthy: Plant resistant/tolerant cultivars (e.g., Contender, Redhaven, Encore), ensure full sun and excellent airflow with proper spacing and annual pruning, avoid overhead irrigation, apply copper sprays at leaf fall and again at bud swell, maintain balanced nutrition (avoid excess nitrogen), clean up fallen leaves and fruit.
